**Tender Description**
----------------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is hosting an Invitation to Qualify for the construction of field cabins on Country Island. The procurement process is divided into two phases: Phase One, which will evaluate the qualifications of interested suppliers, and Phase Two, which will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid based on the specifications and drawings. The qualification list will expire within 60 days or upon the award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever comes first.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

The contract is subject to the terms and conditions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Documents**
-------------

The Invitation to Qualify package, including the technical specifications and drawings, can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery platform.
